title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. L, pt. 160 - Freedom Of Information
content:

§ 160.1 - Purpose and scope and definitions
§ 160.2 - Designation of records access officer
§ 160.3 - Designation of fiscal officer
§ 160.4 - Location
§ 160.5 - Hours of public inspection
§ 160.6 - Requests for public access to records
§ 160.7 - Denial of access to records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. L, pt. 160

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 200, 202[2], 215, 502[3];Public Officers Law, §§ 87[1][b], 88[2], 89[3][4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
